<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" ><tr><td valign="top" style="font: inherit;">Thanks for posting.<br><br>I think in your original experimental specs, you request five 30 second audio clips from five-to-ten people.  Which would be 25-50 clips.  Here you've posted 12.  Will you be posting the others?<br><br>Also, I'd like to hear from the people who created these clips.  How did you go about that?  Did you do exactly five 30 second clips?  Or did you do more, and send in just the best?<br><br><br><br>--- On <b>Sun, 12/28/08, M.A. Coletta (Mike) <i><michaelcoletta@...></i></b> wrote:<br><blockquote style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;"><br>From: M.A. Coletta (Mike) <michaelcoletta@...><br>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Audio files from my impact point ITC sessions<br>To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<br>Date: Sunday, December 28, 2008, 8:23 AM<br><br><div
